name: Hoppy Square DX
description:
It's hip to be square, and no square is hipper or hoppier than a Hoppy Square! This updated "deluxe" take on the 2016 mobile game, Hoppy Square, features new modes, gameplay mechanics, in-game achievements, and other improvements!

• Change between regular and fast speeds for your square!

• Challenge a Campaign with over 50 levels!

• Can you conquer all 10 achievements?

You can play this game on your PC or install the included apk on your Android device to play on the go!
